tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_performance_alert_level AS SELECT aac.amp_activity_id, acv.category_value AS name, aac.amp_categoryvalue_id AS level_code FROM amp_activities_categoryvalues aac JOIN amp_category_value acv ON acv.id = aac.amp_categoryvalue_id JOIN amp_category_class acc ON acc.id = acv.amp_category_class_id WHERE acc.keyname = 'performance_alert_level';
